svconnect

Class RoboRioBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • svconnect.Device
      • svconnect.RoboRioBoard

  • public class RoboRioBoard
extends Device
    A representation of all the pins on a RoboRio board inside a schematic. Names generators and consumers by: [PORT_TYPE]_[NUMERICAL_ARGUMENT_1]_...
    Author:
    tthompso
